    • key

      public K key(V value)
      Searches for a key based on a given value. If scours all linked lists and records looking for a match on the value

    • add

      public void add(K key, V item)
      Adds a key-value pair to the hash table. It calculates the table index based on the key and adds the new record to the corresponding linked list.
      Parameters:
      key -
      item -
